channel.title: AWS,Nodejs,Dynamodb on Jack Liang's portfolio and blog
channel.description: Recent content in AWS,Nodejs,Dynamodb on Jack Liang's portfolio and blog

item.title: Node.js/AWS Dynamodb UpdateItem
item.description: 來源 Update Item 不能 Batch update(批次),一次只能Update一筆(一個id) const AWS = require("aws-sdk"); AWS.config.update({ region: "ap-northeast-1", accessKeyId: "AWS--accessKeyId", secretAccessKey: "AWS--secretAccessKey" }); const docClient = new AWS.DynamoDB.DocumentClient(); const param = { TableName: "UserBackPack", Key: { uid: abc123456 } , UpdateExpression: "set #key1 = :val1", ExpressionAttributeNames: { "#key1": "message" }, ExpressionAttributeValues: { ":val1": "hello2", } }; await docClient.update(param).promise(); 參數說明: TableName : Dynamodb資料表Table Key : 該Table partition key(Id) 或 Secondary Id UpdateExpression : 更新參數邏輯, 用下方(4),(5)參數做更新條件 ExpressionAttributeNames : Table Item參數代寫 ExpressionAttributeValues : 更新值參數代寫
